title: Hideout.Start
body:
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController openingshot>>
<<changeSceneObject SceneShotController CrowdLooking>>
Emma: Hey uhh
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shotonbar>>
...
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController rockycloseup>>
Rocky: She's cool guys, I know her
<<changeSceneObject SceneShotController EmmaAtBar>>
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController emmacloseup>>
Emma: Where is this place?
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController pianocloseup>>
Rocky: It's a little hideout we run
Rocky: how did you find it?
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController emmacloseup>>
Emma: I dunno, I sleepwalk a lot
Emma: end up in places I shouldn't be...
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController rockycloseup>>
Rocky: Well, want a drink?
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController emmacloseup>>
Emma: ...
Emma: Yeah
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController pianocloseup>>
Rocky: Not sure how that piano can hold a tune
Rocky: It's missing most of it's strings
Rocky: not to mention the moisture
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController emmacloseup>>
Emma: What do we do rocky?
Emma: Are we just going to work until we die?
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController rockycloseup>>
Rocky: well....
Rocky: listen
Rocky: there's a pipe in your camp
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController emmacloseup>>
Emma: a pipe?
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController rockycloseup>>
Rocky: yeah, just like the one you sleep walked through
Rocky: anyway, walk into it
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController emmacloseup>>
Emma: and?
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController pianocloseup>>
Rocky: ...
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController emmacloseup>>
Emma: ...alright.
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController rockycloseup>>
Rocky: Are you enjoying your drink?
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController emmacloseup>>
Emma: I haven't had a sip yet
Emma: but I feel kind of
Emma: sleepy...
<<returnToCampScene SceneShotController>>
